newState(Map<String, PlayerInformationToClient>, MarketToClient, DevelopmentCardToClient[][]) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.views.CLIHandler
This method is called after the handle of the leaderCard and updates all the data of all the players and removes from the leader card in hand the one activated, calls then the newTurn() method
newTurn() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.views.CLIHandler
This method handles all the various type of turn and send the data to the server -market: take material from the market and checks if a marketWhiteChange leader power is activated, eventually calling the handler of the marketWhiteChange -buydevelopment: the user buys a card from the development card market, calls eventually a handler for the costLess leaderPower -usedevelopment: the user activates one of the development, the base production, the leader additional production or a development card -viewboard: the user can see the boards of all the players
newTurn(boolean) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
check if the game is ended and send a new turn event to clients
